titleStmt.title: The defense of the aunsvvere to the Admonition against the replie of T.C. By Iohn VVhitgift Doctor of Diuinitie. In the beginning are added these. 4. tables. 1 Of dangerous doctrines in the replie. 2 Of falsifications and vntruthes. 3 Of matters handled at large. 4 A table generall.
titleStmt.author: Whitgift, John, 1530?-1604.

titleStmt.title: The defense of the aunsvvere to the Admonition against the replie of T.C. By Iohn VVhitgift Doctor of Diuinitie. In the beginning are added these. 4. tables. 1 Of dangerous doctrines in the replie. 2 Of falsifications and vntruthes. 3 Of matters handled at large. 4 A table generall.
titleStmt.author: Whitgift, John, 1530?-1604.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henry Binneman, for Humfrey Toye,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Cartwright, Thomas. A replye to an answere made of M. Doctor Whitgifte.
Running title reads: The defense of the answere to the Admonition.
"An examination of the places cited in the end of the Replie touching matters in controuersie", [12] p. at end.
This edition has A1r catchword "fence"; errata on b8r.
2D2 is a cancel. Some copies have slip-cancels at R4r, Y1v, and Y6v.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
